QuestData.Title: Understanding the Mok'Nathal
QuestData.Description: <Leoroxx looks you in the eye with the kind of stare that chills your soul.>$B$BYou come to the Mok'Nathal, but you do not understand us. You do not understand our struggle to survive.$B$BIf you would understand us, then you will have to endure a taste of that struggle.$B$BTo the south are the Vekh'nir arakkoa. They have enslaved a group of ogres in the caverns known as Trogma's Claim and their leader, Vekh is in there.$B$BSlay him!
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Vekh, leader of the Vekh'nir arakkoa.
QuestData.CompletionText: We have many enemies. Some we have chosen, and some, such as the Vehk'nir, we have not.$B$BRegardless, we shall slay all of their chieftains until none stand before us.
QuestData.RewardText: The Vekh'nir are the least of our adversaries.$B$BSo, you know how to slay an overgrown bird. This does not make you a true warrior. This does not give you a full understanding of our ways.$B$BBut it's a start.
